entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 04:44 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: S 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 11 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 11 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 21.
